document_data.name: Tethan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tethans''' were the largest of the two major subethnicities of the [[Calishite]]s.
document_data.Description: Tethans were taller, bulkier, and lighter-skinned than the noble ethnicity of "pure" [[Djen (ethnicity)|Djen]], but they were still darker than most other [[human]] ethnotypes.
document_data.History:
The Tethans were the result of the Djen interbreeding with the original native races of the region of [[Shining Sea]]. They were named Tethans by the people of [[Mulhorand]].

The Tethans comprised almost half of all residents of Calimshan, yet they were forbidden from rising in Calishite society beyond the status of merchants or tradesfolk, and 70% of Tethans in that land were either servants or slaves.
document_data.Notable Tethans: [[El Kahmir|The Kahmir]] crime family was composed of those of Tethan racial stock mixed with [[Mulan]] blood.
